question.question: Describe an old person that you know.
question.questiontitle:
You should say:
• What your relationship is to this person
• How often you see them
• What people think about this person
Explain why you like them.

question.question: Describe a child that you know and like a lot.
question.questiontitle:
You should say:
• Who the child is
• How you know them
• What they enjoy doing
Explain why you like them a lot.

question.question: Describe someone who has had an important influence on your life.
question.questiontitle:
You should say:
• Who the person is
• How long you have known him/her
• What qualities this person has
Explain why they have had such an influence on you.

question.question: Describe a person that you think is very interesting.
question.questiontitle:
You should say:
• Who this person is
• How you met them
• What they like to talk about
Explain why this person is very interesting.

question.question: Describe a present or gift you have given someone.
question.questiontitle:
You should say:
• Who you gave it to
• What kind of present it was
• How it compared to other presents you have given
Explain why you decided to give this particular gift.

question.question: Describe your favourite teacher from school.
question.questiontitle:
You should say:
• What school he/she taught at
• What he/she looked like 
• What subject he/she taught you
Explain why you remember this teacher so well.

question.question: Describe a present or gift someone gave you that you really liked.
question.questiontitle:
You should say:
• What kind of present it was
• Who gave it to you
• Why you were given it
Explain why you liked it.

question.question: Describe a happy childhood event.
question.questiontitle:
You should say:
• When it happened
• Who was involved 
• How you felt at the time
Explain why you remember this particular occasion.

question.question: Describe photograph that you like.
question.questiontitle:
You should say:
• Who is in the photograph
• When the photograph was taken 
• Where the photograph is
Explain why you like the photograph.

question.question: Describe a meal that you had that you remember well.
question.questiontitle:
You should say:
• Where the meal was
• Why you had the meal
• Who you went with 
Explain why you remember this particular occasion.

question.question: Describe a meal that you ate out.
question.questiontitle:
You should say:
• Where you went
• What you ate
• Who you went with 
Explain why you remember this meal.

question.question: Describe a sporting event you attended.
question.questiontitle:
You should say:
• What kind of sport is was
• How it compared to other events you’ve been to
• How often it takes place
Explain why you consider this event to be of interest.

question.question: Describe a type of exercise that you like to do.
question.questiontitle:
You should say:
• What the exercise is
• When you do it 
• Where you do it
Explain why you like this particular exercise.

question.question: Describe a sport that you would like to try.
question.questiontitle:
You should say:
• Which sport it is
• Where you could do the sport
• Who you could do it with
Explain why this sport would be good to try.

question.question: Describe a TV show that you enjoy.
question.questiontitle:
You should say:
• What type of show it is
• How often it is on 
• How popular it is with other people in your country
Explain why you like it.

question.question: Describe some good news that you recently received.
question.questiontitle:
You should say:
• What the news was 
• How you got the news
• Who else you told about it
Explain why this was good news.

question.question: Describe your favourite part of the day.
question.questiontitle:
You should say:
• What time of day this is 
• What you like to do at this time
• Who you are usually with
Explain why this is your favourite part of the day.

question.question: Describe your favourite book.
question.questiontitle:
You should say:
• When you read the book
• What the book is about
• Why you read it
Explain why this book is your favourite.

question.question: Describe a website that you visit a lot.
question.questiontitle:
You should say:
• What the website it about 
• How you found the website
• Who else you told about the website
Explain why you visit the website a lot.
